data.actual_result: They aren't (as you can see in attachments)
data.expected_result: The icons/text should be perfectly/decently centered on the top right buttons
data.short_description: The top right corner selectable buttons doesn't have the icons/texts centered perfectly (Android 4.4.4 Specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Case 1:Go to a channel, and long press the more options icon just to observe the button - Case 2:When creating a new server long press on the create button to observe it - Case 3:When trying to join a server, long press the join button to observe it - (see the attachments for a better explanation)
